definitions.definition: To wet or stain an object completely with some physical quality.
examples: The shirt was imbued with his scent.

definitions.definition: In general, to act in a way which results in an object becoming completely permeated or impregnated by some quality.
examples: The entire text is imbued with the sense of melancholy and hopelessness.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To wet or stain an object completely with some physical quality.
secondary_definitions: In general, to act in a way which results in an object becoming completely permeated or impregnated by some quality.
